Hey Carnage, that's okay.  Anyway, Necromancer and Hell Drak were sent to
Earth to fight alongside the maximals.  They looked around for two bots and
the scanners detected Dinobot and Tavatron close by, so they went to the
location of Dinobot and tavatron and then Necromancer introduced himself
and his sister.  Here's what Necromancer said to Dinobot and Tavatron:

	"Don't pull out your weapons, we are not hostile bots.  My name is
Necromancer, and this is my sister---" Necromancer was interrupted by Hell
Drak.

	"The name's Hell Drak," she said.

	Necromancer continued, "Anyway, we were sent to Earth to help you and the
other Maximals.  Our scanners detected you two very close by so we decided
to meet you.  The scanners say that you are Dinobot and you are Tavatron,
am I correct?" he asked, hoping that he and his sister could gain their
trust.
